'''Tolkien Lietuva''', TL, with its official branch "TL Draugija" ("TL Fellowship") is the [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] in Lithuania.

==History==
The society was founded as an internet discussion forum in spring 2003. The official organization was founded in 2009. Currently, the organization has 18 members, and the community as a whole has some 40-50 active participants.

==Activities==
The society is primarily based around an internet discussion forum, but also organizes real life events in Lithuania: monthly themed gatherings, annual summer camps, annual week-long hiking trips, a springtime celebration of the community birthday, somewhat irregular autumn camps and New Year celebrations.
